resources.string: We might be able to work together after all. So, what is your API key? To prevent the circumstance where the current key is unavailable, I propose that you use the openai key you applied for.
I need your name to be saved
Its sad that you arent give me your api key, I thought our vibe matched :(
You must first send some messages in the current session

Do you know how Chatgpt is not climate friendly? In fact, practically all major language models are ineffective in terms of climate control measures. Recently, one of my friends wrote on this issue, which you may read by clicking this text!!
